meanings.definition: Having a strong or distinctive flavor or odor.
meanings.sent1: The soup had a racier taste than I expected.
meanings.sent2: The cheese had a racier smell than the other varieties.
meanings.sent3: The racier aroma of the coffee woke me up instantly.
meanings.sent4: The racier scent of the flowers filled the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The racier flavor of the spices lingered on my taste buds.

meanings.definition: Having a quality that is more exciting, interesting, or sexually appealing.
meanings.sent1: The racier movie kept me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent2: Her racier outfit turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent3: The racier plot twist in the story took me by surprise.
meanings.sent4: His racier jokes always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent5: The racier dance routine captivated the audience.
